Index >  OnImageAreaSelected

OnImageAreaSelected

Description

This event is triggered when user selects an area (draws a rectangle) on an image in Dynamic Web TWAIN viewer.

Syntax

.RegisterEvent('OnImageAreaSelected',function(sImageIndex, left, top, right, bottom){...});

Remarks

sImageIndex: the index of the image.
left: the coordinate for the left side of the rectangle are the mouse selects.
top: the coordinate for the top side of the rectangle are the mouse selects.
right: the coordinate for the right side of the rectangle are the mouse selects.
bottom: the coordinate for the bottom side of the rectangle are the mouse selects.

See Also

OnMouseRightClick
OnMouseMove
OnMouseDoubleClick
OnMouseClick
OnImageAreaDeSelected

Example

DWObject.RegisterEvent('OnImageAreaSelected', function(sImageIndex, left, top, right, bottom){
    alert(sImageIndex + 'left: ' + left);
});
